control.description: composite control consisting of a list control and a thumbnail panel

subitems.subitem:
<controls> <control> <description>background</description> <type>image</type> <posX>0</posX> <posY>0</posY> <width>276</width> <height>390</height> <texture flipY="yes" diffuse="Thumb_Mask.png" mask="DVDCase_coverflow_mask.png">black.png</texture> </control>
<control> <description>Watched Icon</description> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>237</posX> <posY>15</posY> <width>22</width> <height>22</height> <texture>overlaywatched.png</texture> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)+string.contains(#iswatched, yes)</visible> </control> <control> <description>Un-Watched Icon</description> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>237</posX> <posY>15</posY> <width>22</width> <height>22</height> <texture>overlayunwatched.png</texture> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)+!string.contains(#iswatched, yes)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>Movie Title</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <id>0</id> <posX>22</posX> <posY>9</posY> <width>225</width> <label>#title</label> <font>font13</font> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> <shadowAngle>45</shadowAngle> <shadowDistance>2</shadowDistance> <shadowColor>FF000000</shadowColor> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)</visible> </control>
<control> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>22</posX> <posY>-30</posY> <width>231</width> <height>79</height> <texture>bg_button_nofocus.png</texture> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)</visible> </control>
<control> <type>imagelist</type> <id>1</id> <posX>22</posX> <posY>61</posY> <width>277</width> <height>60</height> <textureWidth>22</textureWidth> <textureHeight>22</textureHeight> <subitems> <subitem>star_nofocus.png</subitem> <subitem>star_focus.png</subitem> </subitems> <orientation>horizontal</orientation> <align>left</align> <imagesToDraw>10</imagesToDraw> <percentage>#rating</percentage> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)</visible> </control> <control> <description>genre</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>22</posX> <posY>93</posY> <width>247</width> <label>#genre</label> <font>font11</font> <textcolor>ffFFFFFF</textcolor> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)</visible> </control> <control> <description>year</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>22</posX> <posY>130</posY> <width>240</width> <label>#year #runtime min #mpaarating</label> <font>font11</font> <textcolor>90FFFFFF</textcolor> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>Director</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>22</posX> <posY>168</posY> <width>240</width> <label>Dir. by #director</label> <font>font11</font> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)</visible> </control> <control> <description>cast</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>22</posX> <posY>210</posY> <width>240</width> <label>#cast</label> <font>font10</font> <lineSpacing>2</lineSpacing> <align>left</align> <textcolor>90FFFFFF</textcolor> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>plot</description> <type>textboxscrollup</type> <posX>22</posX> <posY>247</posY> <width>240</width> <height>62</height> <label>#plot</label> <font>font9</font> <lineSpacing>2</lineSpacing> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> <visible>!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>Title</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <id>0</id> <posX>22</posX> <posY>28</posY> <width>225</width> <label>#selecteditem</label> <font>font13</font> <textcolor>FFFFFFFF</textcolor> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> <shadowAngle>45</shadowAngle> <shadowDistance>2</shadowDistance> <shadowColor>FF000000</shadowColor> <visible>![!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)]</visible> </control>

<control> <description>genre</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>22</posX> <posY>72</posY> <width>240</width> <label>#selecteditem2</label> <font>font10</font> <textcolor>90FFFFFF</textcolor> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> <visible>![!string.equals(#runtime,0)+!string.equals(#year,1900)]</visible> </control>
</controls>
